snippet: Chuck Hagel, a Republican from Nebraska, was elected to the Senate in 1996 and retired in 2008. Following are some of his recent statements on issues he is likely to confront if he is confirmed as secretary of defense.
lead_paragraph: Chuck Hagel, a Republican from Nebraska, was elected to the Senate in 1996 and retired in 2008. Following are some of his recent statements on issues he is likely to confront if he is confirmed as secretary of defense.
